00173       ConstIterator( const FreemanChain & aChain, unsigned int n =0)
00174         : myFc( &aChain ), myPos( 0 )
00175       {
00176         myXY.at(0)=aChain.x0;
00177         myXY.at(1)=aChain.y0;
00178           
00179         if ( n < myFc->chain.size() )
00180           while ( myPos < n )
00181             {
00182               this->next();
00183               // JOL !!!
00184               // ERROR: myPos is already incremented in next().

00186             }
00187         else // iterator end() 
00188           myPos = myFc->chain.size();
00189       }

00280       void 
00281       next()
00282       {
00283         if ( myPos < myFc->chain.size() )
00284           {
00285             switch ( myFc->code( myPos ) )
00286               {
00287               case 0: myXY.at(0)++; break;
00288               case 1: myXY.at(1)++; break;
00289               case 2: myXY.at(0)--; break;
00290               case 3: myXY.at(1)--; break;
00291               }
00292             ++myPos;
00293           }
00294       }
00295                 
00296 
00297 
00302       void
00303       nextInLoop()
00304       {
00305         if ( myPos < myFc->chain.size() )
00306           {
00307             switch ( myFc->code( myPos ) )
00308               {
00309               case 0: myXY.at(0)++; break;
00310               case 1: myXY.at(1)++; break;
00311               case 2: myXY.at(0)--; break;
00312               case 3: myXY.at(1)--; break;
00313               }
00314             myPos = ( myPos + 1 ) % myFc->chain.size();
00315           }
00316       }
00317

00370         
00375       void
00376       previous()
00377       {
00378         if ( myPos > 0 )
00379           {
00380             --myPos;
00381             switch ( myFc->code( myPos ) )
00382               {
00383               case 0: myXY.at(0)--; break;
00384               case 1: myXY.at(1)--; break;
00385               case 2: myXY.at(0)++; break;
00386               case 3: myXY.at(1)++; break;
00387               }
00388           }
00389       }
00390         
00391 
00392 
00397       void
00398       previousInLoop()
00399       {
00400         if ( myPos == 0 ) myPos = myFc->chain.size() - 1;
00401         else --myPos;
00402         switch ( myFc->code( myPos ) )
00403           {
00404           case 0: myXY.at(0)--; break;
00405           case 1: myXY.at(1)--; break;
00406           case 2: myXY.at(0)++; break;
00407           case 3: myXY.at(1)++; break;
00408           }
00409       }

00501     static void read( std::istream & in, FreemanChain & c )
00502     {
00503       string str;
00504       while ( true )
00505         {
00506           getline( in, str );
00507           if ( ! in.good() )
00508             return;
00509           if ( ( str.size() > 0 ) && ( str[ 0 ] != '#' ) )
00510             {
00511               istringstream str_in( str );
00512               str_in >> c.x0 >> c.y0 >> c.chain;
00513               return;
00514             }
00515         }
00516 
00517     };

00555     static void alphabet( char & aZero, char & aOne, char aQuadrant )
00556     {
00557       switch ( aQuadrant )
00558         {
00559         case '0':
00560           aZero = '0';
00561           aOne = '1';
00562           break;
00563         case '1':
00564           aZero = '1';
00565           aOne = '2';
00566           break;
00567         case '2':
00568           aZero = '2';
00569           aOne = '3';
00570           break;
00571         case '3':
00572           aZero = '3';
00573           aOne = '0';
00574           break;
00575         }
00576 
00577     };
00578 
00590     static unsigned int movement( unsigned int aCode1, unsigned int aCode2, bool ccw = true )
00591     {
00592       unsigned int cfg = ( ccw ? 0 : 16 ) + ( aCode1 << 2 ) + aCode2;
00593       static const unsigned int tbl[ 32 ] =
00594         {
00595           2, 1, 0, 3, 3, 2, 1, 0,
00596           0, 3, 2, 1, 1, 0, 3, 2,
00597           2, 3, 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 0,
00598           0, 1, 2, 3, 3, 0, 1, 2
00599         };
00600       return tbl[ cfg ];
00601 
00602     }
00603

00612 
00617     static PointI2 displacement( unsigned int aCode );
00618 
00627     static unsigned int turnedCode( unsigned int aCode, bool ccw = true );

00650     static void pointel2pixel( FreemanChain & aPixChain,
00651                                std::vector<unsigned int> & aPl2pix,
00652                                std::vector<unsigned int> & aPix2pl,
00653                                const FreemanChain & aPlChain )
00654     {
00655       innerContour( aPixChain, aPl2pix, aPix2pl, aPlChain, true );
00656     };
00657 
00685     static void innerContour( FreemanChain & aInnerChain,
00686                               std::vector<unsigned int> & aOuter2inner,
00687                               std::vector<unsigned int> & aInner2outer,
00688                               const FreemanChain & aOuterChain,
00689                               bool ccw = true )
00690     {
00691 
00692       unsigned int nb = aOuterChain.chain.size();
00693       unsigned int j = 0;
00694       aOuter2inner.clear();
00695       aOuter2inner.reserve( nb );
00696       // aInnerChain.chain.reserve( nb + 4 );
00697       aInnerChain.chain = "";
00698       aInner2outer.clear();
00699       aInner2outer.reserve( nb + ( ccw ? 4 : -4 ) );
00700       int dx0, dy0;
00701       int dx1, dy1;
00702       FreemanChain<TInteger>::displacement( dx0, dy0, aOuterChain.code( 0 ) );
00703       int turn = ccw ? 1 : 3;
00704       FreemanChain<TInteger>::displacement( dx1, dy1, ( aOuterChain.code( 0 ) + turn ) % 4 );
00705       dx0 += dx1;
00706       dy0 += dy1;
00707       aInnerChain.x0 = dx0 > 0 ? aOuterChain.x0 : aOuterChain.x0 - 1;
00708       aInnerChain.y0 = dy0 > 0 ? aOuterChain.y0 : aOuterChain.y0 - 1;
00709 
00710       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_begin = aOuterChain.begin();
00711       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = it_begin;
00712       it.next();
00713       for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < nb; ++i )
00714         {
00715           // Check if contour is open.
00716           // cerr << "i=" << i << " code=" << aOuterChain.code( i ) << endl;
00717           switch ( movement( aOuterChain.code( i ),
00718                              aOuterChain.code( ( i + 1 ) % nb ),
00719                              ccw ) )
00720             {
00721             case 0:
00722               // contour going in then out.
00723               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ i ];
00724               aInnerChain.chain += ( ( ( (unsigned int) ( aOuterChain.chain[ i ] - '0' )
00725                                          + ( ccw ? 3 : 1 ) ) )
00726                                      % 4 ) + '0';
00727               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ ( i + 1 ) % nb ];
00728               aOuter2inner.push_back( j );
00729               aInner2outer.push_back( i );
00730               aInner2outer.push_back( i + 1 );
00731               aInner2outer.push_back( i + 1 );
00732               j += 3;
00733               break;
00734 
00735             case 1:
00736               // contour turning toward its inside.
00737               aOuter2inner.push_back( j );
00738               break;
00739 
00740             case 2:
00741               // contour going straight ahead
00742               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ i ];
00743               aOuter2inner.push_back( j );
00744               aInner2outer.push_back( i );
00745               ++j;
00746               break;
00747 
00748             case 3:
00749               // contour turning toward its outside.
00750               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ i ];
00751               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ ( i + 1 ) % nb ];
00752               aOuter2inner.push_back( j );
00753               aInner2outer.push_back( i );
00754               aInner2outer.push_back( i + 1 );
00755               j += 2;
00756               break;
00757             }
00758 
00759 
00760           // Advances along contour and check if it is a closed contour.
00761           it.next();
00762           if ( ( i == nb - 1 )
00763                && ( *it_begin != *it ) )
00764             // freeman chain is *not* a closed loop.
00765             {
00766               aInnerChain.chain += aOuterChain.chain[ i ];
00767               aOuter2inner.push_back( j );
00768               aInner2outer.push_back( i );
00769               ++i;
00770               ++j;
00771               break;
00772             }
00773         }
00774 
00775 
00776     }
00777 
00804     static void cleanContour( std::vector<FreemanChain> & aCleanCs,
00805                               std::vector< std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> > & aC2clean,
00806                               std::vector< std::vector<unsigned int> > & aClean2c,
00807                               const FreemanChain & c,
00808                               bool ccw = true )
00809     {
00810 
00811     }
00834     static bool cleanOuterSpikes( FreemanChain & aCleanC,
00835                                   std::vector<unsigned int> & aC2clean,
00836                                   std::vector<unsigned int> & aClean2c,
00837                                   const FreemanChain & c,
00838                                   bool ccw = true )
00839     {
00840       unsigned int nb = c.chain.size();
00841       if ( nb == 0 )
00842         {
00843           cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes]"
00844                << " cleanOuterSpikes: Empty input chain"
00845                << endl;
00846           return false;
00847         }
00848 
00849       ModuloComputer< DGtal::int32_t > mc( nb );
00850       ModuloComputer< DGtal::int32_t >::UnsignedInteger i = 0;
00851       ModuloComputer< DGtal::int32_t >::UnsignedInteger j = 0;
00852       vector<unsigned int> c2cleanTMP;
00853       aCleanC.chain.reserve( nb );
00854       aCleanC.chain = "";
00855       aC2clean.clear();
00856       aClean2c.clear();
00857       aC2clean.reserve( nb );
00858       aClean2c.reserve( nb );
00859       c2cleanTMP.reserve( nb );
00860       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = c.begin();
00861       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator itn = c.begin();
00862       itn.nextInLoop();
00863       // Find a consistent starting point.
00864       unsigned int n;
00865       unsigned int size_spike = 0;
00866       for ( n = 0; n < nb; ++n )
00867         {
00868           size_spike = 0;
00869           while ( movement( it.getCode(), itn.getCode(), ccw ) == 0 )
00870             {
00871               it.previousInLoop();
00872               itn.nextInLoop();
00873               mc.increment( i );
00874               size_spike += 2;
00875               if ( size_spike >= nb )
00876                 {
00877                   cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes]"
00878                        << " Spike is longer than contour !"
00879                        << " size_spike=" << size_spike
00880                        << " nb=" << nb
00881                        << endl;
00882                   return false;
00883                 }
00884             }
00885           mc.increment( i );
00886           it = itn;
00887           itn.nextInLoop();
00888           if ( size_spike > 0 )
00889             break;
00890         }
00891       unsigned int start_idx = it.getPosition();
00892       i = start_idx;
00893       // JOL : 2009/07/7, added starting coordinates
00894       PointI2 P = *it;
00895       aCleanC.x0 = P.at(0);
00896       aCleanC.y0 = P.at(1);
00897 
00898       // cerr << "Starting point is " << i << endl;
00899       ASSERT( ( n < nb ) || ( i == 0 ) );
00900       if ( ( n == nb ) )
00901         { // do nothing
00902           aCleanC.chain = c.chain;
00903           for ( unsigned int n = 0; n < nb; ++n )
00904             {
00905               aC2clean.push_back( n );
00906               aClean2c.push_back( n );
00907             }
00908           if ( size_spike != 0 )
00909             cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes]"
00910                  << "No starting point found (only spikes !)" << endl;
00911 
00912           return size_spike == 0;
00913         }
00914       // Loops over all letters.
00915       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_begin = it;
00916       deque<unsigned int> clean_code;
00917       deque<unsigned int> clean_idx;
00918       vector<unsigned int> begin_outer_spike;
00919       vector<unsigned int> end_outer_spike;
00920       // i follows iterator it.
00921       do
00922         {
00923           clean_code.push_back( it.getCode() );
00924           clean_idx.push_back( i );
00925           itn = it;
00926           it.nextInLoop();
00927           mc.increment( i );
00928           // cerr << "- i=" << i << " (" << clean_code.back()
00929           //       << it.getCode() << ") ";
00930           unsigned int size_spike = 0;
00931           unsigned int last_spike_idx = end_outer_spike.empty() ?
00932             start_idx :
00933             end_outer_spike.back();
00934           j = i;
00935           while ( ( ! clean_code.empty() )
00936                   && ( j != last_spike_idx )
00937                   && ( movement( clean_code.back(), it.getCode(), ccw ) == 0 )
00938                   && ( it != it_begin ) )
00939             {
00940               clean_code.pop_back();
00941               clean_idx.pop_back();
00942               mc.increment( i );
00943               mc.decrement( j );
00944               it.nextInLoop();
00945               itn.previousInLoop();
00946               size_spike += 2;
00947             }
00948           // cerr << "i=" << i << " size_spike=" << size_spike
00949           //       << " last_spike_idx=" << last_spike_idx
00950           //       << endl;
00951           if ( size_spike != 0 )
00952             {
00953               // There is a spike. Is it an outer one ?
00954               unsigned int previous_code = itn.getCode();
00955               unsigned int previous_idx = itn.getPosition();
00956               // JOL : do not
00957               // consider any more "cleaned contour" since we cannot go
00958               // further than the last spike.
00959               // unsigned int previous_code =
00960               //   clean_code.empty() ? itn.getCode() : clean_code.back();
00961               // unsigned int previous_idx =
00962               //   clean_code.empty() ? itn.getPosition() : clean_idx.back();
00963               itn = it;
00964               itn.previousInLoop();
00965               unsigned int move1 = movement( previous_code,
00966                                              ( itn.getCode() + 2 ) % 4, ccw );
00967               unsigned int move2 = movement( itn.getCode(), it.getCode() , ccw );
00968               bool return_spike = ( move1 == 0 ) || ( move2 == 0 );
00969               bool outer_spike = ( move1 == 3 ) || ( move2 == 3 );
00970               //          if ( return_spike )
00971               //            cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes] return spike."
00972               //                 << endl;
00973               //          if ( ! ( ( outer_spike && ( move1 != 1 ) && ( move2 != 1 ) )
00974               //                   || ( ! outer_spike && ( move1 != 3 ) && ( move2 != 3 ) ) ) )
00975               //            cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes] "
00976               //                 << "Weird spike. Invalid contour (expected 3 3) ?"
00977               //                 << " move1=" << move1
00978               //                 << " move2=" << move2
00979               //                 << " ccw=" << ccw
00980               //                 << " start_idx=" << start_idx
00981               //                 << " size_spike=" << size_spike
00982               //                 << " it=" << it.getPosition()
00983               //                 << " itp=" << previous_idx
00984               //                 << endl
00985               //                 << c.chain << endl;
00986               // Process waiting steps.
00987               if ( outer_spike || return_spike )
00988                 {
00989                   begin_outer_spike.push_back( mc.next( previous_idx ) );
00990                   end_outer_spike.push_back( i );
00991                   // cout << " outer spike [" << begin_outer_spike.back()
00992                   //       << "," << end_outer_spike.back() << "[  " << endl;
00993                 }
00994             }
00995         }
00996       while ( it != it_begin );
00997 
00998       // Once outer spikes are known, we can create the new contour.
00999       aC2clean.resize( nb );
01000       i = start_idx % nb;
01001       j = 0;
01002       unsigned int nb_spikes = begin_outer_spike.size();
01003       unsigned int k = 0;
01004       n = 0;
01005       while ( n < nb )
01006         {
01007           if ( ( k == nb_spikes ) || ( i != begin_outer_spike[ k ] ) )
01008             {
01009               aCleanC.chain.push_back( c.chain[ i ] );
01010               aC2clean[ i ] = j;
01011               aClean2c.push_back( i );
01012               mc.increment( i );
01013               ++j;
01014               ++n;
01015             }
01016           else
01017             {
01018               while ( i != end_outer_spike[ k ] )
01019                 {
01020                   aC2clean[ i ] = j;
01021                   mc.increment( i );
01022                   ++n;
01023                 }
01024               ++k;
01025             }
01026         }
01027       for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < nb; ++i )
01028         if ( aC2clean[ i ] >= aCleanC.chain.size() )
01029           { 
01030             if ( aC2clean[ i ] == aCleanC.chain.size() )
01031               aC2clean[ i ] = 0;
01032             else
01033               {
01034                 cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes]"
01035                      << "Bad correspondence for aC2clean[" << i << "]"
01036                      << " = " << aC2clean[ i ] << " >= " << aCleanC.chain.size()
01037                      << endl;
01038                 aC2clean[ i ] = aC2clean[ i ] % aCleanC.chain.size();
01039               }
01040           }
01041       
01042       for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < aCleanC.chain.size(); ++j )
01043         if ( aClean2c[ j ] >= nb )
01044           {
01045             cerr << "[DGtal::FreemanChain::cleanOuterSpikes]"
01046                  << "Bad correspondence for aClean2c[" << j << "]"
01047                  << " = " << aClean2c[ j ] << " >= " << nb
01048                  << endl;
01049             aClean2c[ j ] = aClean2c[ j ] % nb;
01050           }
01051 
01052 
01053 
01054       return true;
01055     };
01056 
01057     //     /**
01058     //      * Given a Freeman chain [c] coding a 4-connected pixel loop, computes
01059     //      * its subsampling by the transformation:
01060     //      * X = ( x - x0 ) div h,
01061     //      * Y = ( y - y0 ) div v.
01062     //      *
01063     //      * @param aSubc (output) the subsampled Freeman chain code (may
01064     //      * contain spikes)
01065     //      *
01066     //      * @param aC2subc (output) the mapping associating an element to
01067     //      * its subsampled element.
01068     //      *
01069     //      * @param aSubc2c (output) the inverse mapping associating a
01070     //      * subsampled element to its element. More precisely, subc2c[ j ]
01071     //      * is the last pointel to be in j.
01072     //      *
01073     //      * @param c the input chain code.
01074     //      *
01075     //      * @param h the subsampling along x
01076     //      * @param v the subsampling along y
01077     //      * @param x0 the x-origin of the frame (X,Y) in (x,y)
01078     //      * @param y0 the y-origin of the frame (X,Y) in (x,y)
01079     //      *
01080     //      * @return 'false' if initial contour was empty or if [subc] is empty,
01081     //      * 'true' otherwise.
01082     //      */

01175     static void getContourPoints(const FreemanChain & fc, std::vector<PointI2> & aVContour)
01176     {
01177       aVContour.clear();
01178       for ( typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = fc.begin();
01179             it != fc.end();
01180             ++it )
01181         {
01182           aVContour.push_back(*it);
01183         }
01184     }

01282     void computeBoundingBox( int & min_x, int & min_y,
01283                              int & max_x, int & max_y ) const
01284     {
01285 
01286       min_x = max_x = x0;
01287       min_y = max_y = y0;
01288       for ( typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = begin();
01289             it != end();
01290             ++it )
01291         {
01292           PointI2 p( *it );
01293           if ( p.at(0) < min_x )
01294             min_x = p.at(0);
01295           else
01296             if ( p.at(0) > max_x )
01297               max_x = p.at(0);
01298           if ( p.at(1) < min_y )
01299             min_y = p.at(1);
01300           else
01301             if ( p.at(1) > max_y )
01302               max_y = p.at(1);
01303         }
01304 
01305     }
01306 
01325     //BK
01326     typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator
01327     findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const
01328     {
01329       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = begin();
01330       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_end = end();
01331       // find first letters a and b.
01332       unsigned int code1 = it.getCode();
01333       it.next();
01334       while ( ( it != it_end ) && ( it.getCode() == code1 ) )
01335         it.next();
01336       ASSERT( ( it != it_end )
01337               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] 1-letter freeman chain." );
01338       unsigned int  code2 = it.getCode();
01339       // find third letter c.
01340       while ( ( it != it_end ) && ( ( it.getCode() == code1 )
01341                                     || ( it.getCode() == code2 ) ) )
01342         it.next();
01343       ASSERT( ( it != it_end )
01344               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] 2-letters Freeman chain." );
01345       unsigned int code3 = it.getCode();
01346       // reorder a and b.
01347       it.previous();
01348       if ( it.getCode() != code2 )
01349         swap( code1, code2 );
01350       // find first a.
01351       do
01352         {
01353           it.previous();
01354         }
01355       while ( it.getCode() == code2 );
01356       char a_char = chain[ it.getPosition() ];
01357       // the next is the first b.
01358       it.next();
01359       char b_char = chain[ it.getPosition() ];
01360       // Reorder the alphabet to match the quadrant change.
01361       while ( A.order( b_char ) != 1 )
01362         A.shiftLeft();
01363       if ( A.order( a_char ) == 0 )
01364         {
01365           A.reverse();
01366           while ( A.order( b_char ) != 1 )
01367             A.shiftLeft();
01368         }
01369       ASSERT( ( A.order( b_char ) == 1 )
01370               && ( A.order( a_char ) == 2 )
01371               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] Internal error: invalid Quadrant change found." );
01372       return it;
01373 
01374 
01375     }
01376 
01397     //BK
01398     typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator
01399     findQuadrantChange4( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const
01400     {
01401       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = begin();
01402       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_end = end();
01403       // find first letters a and b.
01404       uint code1 = it.getCode();
01405       it.next();
01406       while ( ( it != it_end ) && ( it.getCode() == code1 ) )
01407         it.next();
01408       ASSERT( ( it != it_end )
01409               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] 1-letter freeman chain." );
01410       uint code2 = it.getCode();
01411       // find third letter c.
01412       while ( ( it != it_end ) && ( ( it.getCode() == code1 )
01413                                     || ( it.getCode() == code2 ) ) )
01414         it.next();
01415       ASSERT( ( it != it_end )
01416               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] 2-letters Freeman chain." );
01417       unsigned int code3 = it.getCode();
01418       // find fourth letter d.
01419       while ( ( it != it_end ) && ( ( it.getCode() == code1 )
01420                                     || ( it.getCode() == code2 )
01421                                     || ( it.getCode() == code3 ) ) )
01422         it.next();
01423       ASSERT( ( it != it_end )
01424               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] 3-letters Freeman chain." );
01425       unsigned int  code4 = it.getCode();
01426       // define true c.
01427       it.previous();
01428       code3 = it.getCode();
01429       // find first b.
01430       do
01431         {
01432           it.previous();
01433         }
01434       while ( it.getCode() == code3 );
01435       char a_char = chain[ it.getPosition() ];
01436       // the next is the first c.
01437       it.next();
01438       char b_char = chain[ it.getPosition() ];
01439       // Reorder the alphabet to match the quadrant change.
01440       while ( A.order( b_char ) != 1 )
01441         A.shiftLeft();
01442       if ( A.order( a_char ) == 0 )
01443         {
01444           A.reverse();
01445           while ( A.order( b_char ) != 1 )
01446             A.shiftLeft();
01447         }
01448       ASSERT( ( A.order( b_char ) == 1 )
01449               && ( A.order( a_char ) == 2 )
01450               && "[DGtal::FreemanChain::findQuadrantChange( OrderedAlphabet & A ) const] Internal error: invalid Quadrant change found." );
01451       return it;
01452 
01453     }
01454 
01467     int isClosed() const
01468     {
01469       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it = this->begin();
01470       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_end = this->end();
01471       typename FreemanChain<TInteger>::ConstIterator it_suiv = it;
01472       PointI2 spos = *it;
01473       int nb_ccw_turns = 0;
01474       while ( it != it_end )
01475         {
01476           int code1 = it.getCode();
01477           it_suiv.nextInLoop();
01478           int code2 = it_suiv.getCode();
01479           uint diff = ( code2 - code1 + 4 ) % 4;
01480           if ( diff == 1 )
01481             ++nb_ccw_turns;
01482           else
01483             if ( diff == 3 )
01484               --nb_ccw_turns;
01485             else
01486               if ( diff == 2 )
01487                 return 0;
01488           ++it;
01489         }
01490       if ( spos == *it_suiv )
01491         return nb_ccw_turns / 4;
01492       else
01493         return 0;
01494 
01495 
01496     }
